title: Valances, 18th century
medium:
Medium: tempera on pineapple fiber, silk fringe
Technique: painted on plain weave gauze
creditline: Gift of Marquis Val Verde de la Sierra
description: White sheer fabric painted with a fragmentary floral design in polychrome. Green, red and white fringe on the edges. Tapes for tieing at either end.
